abstract: Carlyle Group has named Adena T. Friedman as chief financial officer, a move that will fuel further speculation that the private equity giant is moving closer to an initial public offering.
snippet: Carlyle Group has named Adena T. Friedman as chief financial officer, a move that will fuel further speculation that the private equity giant is moving closer to an initial public offering.
lead_paragraph: The Carlyle Group has named Adena T. Friedman as chief financial officer, a move that will fuel further speculation that the private equity giant is moving closer to an initial public offering.
